messages.subject: Name of book
messages.msgSnippet: I m sorry, I deleted posts before I responded to the one asking me for the name of a craft book. It is called: Kids Create! by Laurie Carlson Hope that helps!
messages.messageBody:
I'm sorry, I deleted posts before I responded to the one asking me for the name of a craft book.

It is called:

Kids Create! by Laurie Carlson

Hope that helps!

Kristen


****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
